Citywide Spelling Championship

Title
Citywide Spelling Championship
Date
4/27/61
Description
A pamphlet on New York World Telegram and Sun's 16th annual spellingbee. The competition took place at Town Hall, New York. The pamphlet includes descriptions of the spelling bee, past winners, the prizes and spelling bee officials.
Contributor
Liv Wright
Tags
Love for Learning, Privilege, Quality Education, Exposure

The Modern School

Independent Black Education in Harlem, 1934-1998
